name: Customizable Minimal Scrollbars V1.6
description: This style gives you maximum control over the look of your scrollbars with the fewest lines of code. This style matches any theme you throw at it thanks to having over 1000 different combinations. Thankfully, your flashy new scrollbars are un-intrusive thanks to the fact that they float over the page and are unlikely to interfere with page contents; and if floating is too much for you, feel free to enable autohiding. Compatible with most Gecko based browsers. Refresh the page after installing to see results.
